subsection.name: SchemaCrawler Database Scripting
subsection.p: SchemaCrawler is a command-line tool that allows you to script against your database, using JavaScript. Database meta-data is provided to your script, as the "database" object, and you can use any of the API methods to obtain details about your schema. A live database connection is provided to your script as the "connection" object. You can use standard JDBC to script against the database. J2SE 6 is required for this functionality to work.
For more details, see scripting example in the SchemaCrawler examples download.
